issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

Также информация пользователям расширения для Яндекс браузера - обратите внимание, что этот браузер ограничивает доступ расширениям как к своим, так и бывшим сервисам. Если хотите продолжить использование этого браузера, то необходимо установить программу вместо расширения, либо сменить браузер на другой.

However, take also a look at ``` ! maxstream.video/js/googima.js | maxstream.video/js/dnsads.js maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'xRds', 'false') maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'cRAds', 'true') ```

comment.body: `maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'brebre', 'true')` should be enough. However, take also a look to ``` ! ads.maxstream.video/popunder.js maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'bilbilbil', 'true') maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'brebre', 'true') maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'terdterd', 'true') ``` ``` ! maxstream.video/js/googima.js | maxstream.video/js/dnsads.js maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', xRds'', 'false') maxstreams.site#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'cRAds', 'true') ```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: perchance.org

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://perchance.org/ai-text-to-image-generator

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

AdGuard gets detected on the website and the page gets reloaded after 60 seconds when "OK" on the alert is clicked.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/24798198/1380d69a-514f-48e7-96f8-a2c19a837be9)

</details>

I am currently using my own UserScript in Tampermonkey for bypassing the ads.

Here's the UserScript: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/476914-ads-perchance/code

I don't know if it's possible to create an AdGuard filter from this.




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I wanted to say that this might have gotten bypassed.  I just heard of this site and I am getting the message about adblockers and the automatic 60 second reload.

Should I make a new post about it,  I wasn't sure if I should or if replying in here would be less clutter.

I have all the base/default filters and oisd big as well.
1.1.1.1 dns and "standard" tracking protection.

comment.body:
Donation banners aren't exactly new to Internet Archive.

What is more baffling, but which I myself should submit as a separate report, is that Wayback Machine has begun to replace roughly half of "404" dead images with donation prompts as well, which is kinda insane of them. It *seems* to be easiest to reproduce for Tumblr, but I'd have to find a SFW one from circa 2016.

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

Также информация пользователям расширения для Яндекс браузера - обратите внимание, что этот браузер ограничивает доступ расширениям как к своим, так и бывшим сервисам. Если хотите продолжить использование этого браузера, то необходимо установить программу вместо расширения, либо сменить браузер на другой.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

_No response_

_No response_

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

Также информация пользователям расширения для Яндекс браузера - обратите внимание, что этот браузер ограничивает доступ расширениям как к своим, так и бывшим сервисам. Если хотите продолжить использование этого браузера, то необходимо установить программу вместо расширения, либо сменить браузер на другой.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce it, but I suppose that it might be caused by custom filters added to DNS filters.
Please try to add this rule:
```adblock
121clicks.com$$script[wildcard="*atob*goog#html*"][min-length="10000"][max-length="20000"]
```
to user rules in `Protection -> Ad blocking -> User rules`.

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://perchance.org/ai-text-to-image-generator

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

AdGuard gets detected on the website and the page gets reloaded after 60 seconds when "OK" on the alert is clicked.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/24798198/1380d69a-514f-48e7-96f8-a2c19a837be9)

</details>

I am currently using my own UserScript in Tampermonkey for bypassing the ads.

Here's the UserScript: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/476914-ads-perchance/code

I don't know if it's possible to create an AdGuard filter from this.

comment.body:
> Fine. They’re Annoyances at the absolute minimum

We can't block them for all users. For example for me whole FB is redundant. But I don't block it.



> you must be using some extra fancy sauce then, because everyone in this ticket can see all of the things I’ve mentioned in my ticket. What are your settings and versions? You’re using Safari on iOS 17.1.1, right? Are you using Request Desktop website? Because that’s the only way to see Sponsored posts. If you’re using Request Mobile website, you’ll see Suggested pages, Reels, and People You May Know, constantly. But please, please fix this. This has been going on for far too long, and I’m about done with AdGuard, even after I paid for a Lifetime family subscription.

I use user's settings when check reports (not counting the other options I'm checking).

@AdamWr @jellizaveta Please take a look (ads).
